title: School-Based Literature Reading Design Through Interactive Dialogue

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Literary Theories and Analytical Methods
context.additional_context: Learner roles (students/job seekers), advanced domain expertise, formative assessment-focused, smartphone-based limited technological environment

learning_goals: Provide creative interpretations in interactive discussions using literary texts at least three times
Create a 5-stage analytical framework for the formation of literary identity through peer feedback-based PBL activities
Propose three interaction strategies to improve negative experiences in assessment-driven learning

resources: Mobile App for Literary Appreciation (Free Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
